name: Peppy Pairs - Memory Trainer
description:
Think you’ve got the best memory around? Peppy Pairs will put you to the test!

If you love puzzle, strategy, memory, and brain training challenges, you’ll love Peppy Pairs!

The innovative reimagining of memory matching gameplay. Enjoy 100s of loveable and unique characters as you tackle challenging memory puzzles. Power-ups and obstacles provide an unexpected twist to every level.

Features:
* Stunning graphics and unique, brain training gameplay.
* Exercise your brain in the most fun way!
* Discover 100s of unique characters and re-pair landmarks in colorful worlds.
* Power-ups and obstacles give the game of memory a whole new twist!
* Social integration lets you connect with friends to share progress and enjoy Peppy Pairs together!
* Easy to play and a fun challenge to master.
* Great fit for players who love games like jigsaw puzzles, mahjong, word search, solitaire, match-3 and other ‘smart games’.
* Free with regular updates!

Peppy Pairs will keep you guessing - and matching - for weeks!

Join our active player community on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/peppypairs
